testcase.classname: Verify that user is able to order the desired products successfully
testcase.name: Order Products Successfully
testcase.system-out: Given I add four different products to my wish list.........................passed When I view my wishlist table...............................................passed Then I find total four selected items in my wishlist........................passed When I search for "lowest" price product....................................passed And I am able to add the lowest price item to my cart.......................passed Then I am able to verify the item in my cart................................passed
